list.title: Client
list.description: Class wrapping @graphistry/js-upload-api::Client for client->server File and Dataset uploads using username and password authentication.

list.title: ClientPKey
list.description: Class wrapping @graphistry/js-upload-api::ClientPKey for client->server File and Dataset uploads using personal key authentication.

list.title: Dataset
list.description: Class from @graphistry/js-upload-api::Dataset for combining files into a single visualizable graph.

list.title: EdgeFile
list.description: Helper class from @graphistry/js-upload-api::EdgeFile for tracking intent when creating a File object for uploading.

list.title: File
list.description: Class from @graphistry/js-upload-api::File for uploading data and then reusing as part of Dataset graph visualizations.

list.title: Graphistry.tickClustering
list.description: Run a number of milliseconds of Graphistry's clustering algorithm

list.title: NodeFile
list.description: Helper class from @graphistry/js-upload-api::NodeFile for tracking intent when creating a File object for uploading.

list.title: addExclusion
list.description: Add an exclusion to the visualization with the given expression

list.title: addExclusions
list.description: Add an exclusion to the visualization with the given expression

list.title: addFilter
list.description: Add a filter to the visualization with the given expression

list.title: addFilter
list.description: Add filters to the visualization with the given expression

list.title: autocenter
list.description: Center the view of the graph

list.title: encodeAxis
list.description: Add an axis to the graph

list.title: encodeColor
list.description: Change colors based on an attribute. Pass null for attribute, mapping to clear.

list.title: encodeDefaultEdgeIcons
list.description: Single-argument edge default icons (user-unset) based on an attribute for React props

list.title: encodeDefaultIcons
list.description: Change default (user-unset) icons based on an attribute. Pass undefined for attribute, mapping to clear.

list.title: encodeDefaultPointIcons
list.description: Single-argument point default icons (user-unset) based on an attribute for React props

list.title: encodeEdgeColor
list.description: Single-argument version of {@link encodeColor} used for React props

list.title: encodeEdgeIcons
list.description: Single-argument edge change icons based on an attribute for React props

list.title: encodeIcons
list.description: Change icons based on an attribute. Pass undefined for attribute, mapping to clear.

list.title: encodePointColor
list.description: Single-argument version of {@link encodeColor} used for React props

list.title: encodePointIcons
list.description: Single-argument point change icons based on an attribute for React props

list.title: encodePointSize
list.description: Single-argument point change size based on an attribute for React props

list.title: encodeSize
list.description: Change size based on an attribute. Pass null for attribute, mapping to clear.

list.title: getCurrentWorkbook
list.description: Read the workbook ID

list.title: labelUpdates
list.description:
Get or create an {@link Observable} stream of all label updates from the visualization.

The {@link Observable} returned by this method emits inner Observables, where each inner {@link Observable} is tied to the lifetime of the label for which it was created.

For each label rendered in the visualization, the {@link Observable} returned by this method will create and emit a new inner {@link Observable}. The inner {@link Observable} will emit events when the label changes. For example, if the user clicks on the label, or the label changes position because of a pan/zoom, the inner {@link Observable} will emit an event.

The inner {@link Observable} for a label will complete if the label is removed from the screen.

list.description: Serialization and coordination for formatting postMessage API calls, used with {@link GraphistryState} {@link Observable}s

list.title: makeCallerJSON
list.description: Serialization and coordination for formatting postMessage API calls, used with {@link GraphistryState} {@link Observable}s. Adds json desrialization to {@link makeCaller}.

list.title: makeGetterJSON
list.description: Serialization and coordination for formatting postMessage API calls, used with {@link GraphistryState} {@link Observable}. Adds json desrialization to {@link makeGetter}.

list.description: Serialization and coordination for formatting postMessage API calls, used with {@link GraphistryState} {@link Observable}s

list.title: makeSetterWithModel
list.description: Serialization and coordination for formatting postMessage API calls, used with {@link GraphistryState} {@link Observable}s

list.title: module:graphistryJS
list.description: Function that wraps an IFrame as an {@link Observable} {@link GraphistryState} - other methods in this library can be piped with it

list.description: Reset color encoding

list.description: Reset the edge color encoding

list.description: Reset the edge icon encoding

list.description: Reset all exclusions in a visualization

list.title: resetFilters
list.description: Reset all filters in a visualization

list.title: resetIcons
list.description: Reset the icon encoding

list.title: resetPointColor
list.description: Reset the point color encoding

list.title: resetPointIcons
list.description: Reset the point icon encoding

list.description: Reset the point size encoding

list.title: saveWorkbook
list.description: Save the current workbook. A saved workbook will persist the analytics state of the visualization, including active filters and exclusions

list.title: selectionUpdates
list.description: Get or create an {@link Observable} stream of all selection updates from the visualization. UNSTABLE: This API is subject to change in future versions. The security model for this is being developed, in the mean time it is disabled by default. Contact us for help to prototype this feature.

list.title: setHighlightExternal
list.description: UNSTABLE: Set the highlight. Currently, this uses internal ids and will be updated to use external ids.

list.title: setSelectionExternal
list.description: UNSTABLE: Set the selection. Currently, this uses internal ids and will be updated to use external ids.

list.title: subscribeLabels
list.description: Subscribe to label change and exit events

list.title: subscribeSelections
list.description: Subscribe to selection change events

list.title: toggleHistograms
list.description: Toggle histogram panel

list.title: toggleInspector
list.description: Toggle inspector panel

list.title: togglePanel
list.description: Toggle a top menu panel on/off. If panel is an array, interpret as [panel, turnOn]. Only one panel is turned on; the rest are turned off.

list.title: toggleTimebars
list.description: Toggle timebars panel

list.title: toogleToolbar
list.description: Hide or Show Toolbar UI

list.title: updateSetting
list.description:
Modify a settings value in the visualization

Available Settings Value Type
showToolbar boolean
pruneOrphans boolean
showArrows boolean
background color as hex or rgba string
edgeOpacity number (0 to 1)
edgeSize number (0.1 to 10)
edgeCurvature number (0.1 to 1)
pointOpacity number (0 to 1)
pointSize number (0.1 to 10)
neighborhoodHighlight string ("incoming", "outgoing", "both", "none")
neighborhoodHighlightHops uint
zoom uint
center const 0
labelOpacity boolean
labelEnabled boolean
labelPOI boolean
labelLabelPOI boolean
labelHighlightEnabled boolean
labelInspectorEnabled boolean
labelShowActions boolean
labelColor color as hex or rgba string
labelBackground color as hex or rgba string
precisionVsSpeed int (-5 to +5)
gravity number (0 to 10)
scalingRatio number (0 to 10)
edgeInfluence number (0 to 10)
strongGravity boolean
dissuadeHubs boolean
linLog boolean
lockedX boolean
lockedY boolean
lockedR boolean

list.title: updateZoom
list.description: Update the camera zoom level
